About



Do you want to be a better you?



It’s All About Me.

Well, the you version of me.

meometer — like a speedometer — measures something. It measures you.

Why on earth would you want to do this?

Because its a fast, efficient way to become the baddest version of yourself possible. You know, the rich, healthy, well balanced version of yourself.

meometer helps turn you into Y O U.


How?

You define things in your life you want to track, and watch your Intent become reality through Action.

As a reminder time exists and is a precious, limited resource, in the desktop application The Line drops from the top of your screen over a chunk of time.

These chunks of time are punctuated by Nudges, messages from you -> to you, reminders to get the most out of your time and effort and life.


Visualize Where Your Attention Goes

Yep. It’s scary, though by tracking Actions and Projects we get to see everything from opportunity loss to the brilliant, sublime uses of our time.

Sculpting, playing, windsurfing, dinner with friends, etc.


Keep Yourself on the Rails

Correct your behavior in the moment.

Don’t find out too late you forgot to be awesome!*

Be your best self.



Sign up here!



version 2

This, the second generation of meometer, builds on the tens of thousands of hours of experience learned from using version 1 continuously for the last 7 years.

Evolving from a pomodoro tool to a self mentorship platform, v2 opens the gates to your evolution.

We’re talking new benefits from the new features and new flexibility.

Thanks for trying, and we love feedback!



Get on the beta list!



*h/t to @FAKEGRIMLOCK, ‘cos if that isn’t his, it grew in his yard.
